name: Shadow Blight
description: The Shadow Blight is a small plant creature that resembles a stump of a dead tree when motionless, thriving in darkness and decay. It has resilient features with a decent level of natural armor and hit points.
memorable: Its ability to animate plants and create more Shadow Blights makes it a formidable threat in natural environments.
goals: It typically hides in the shadows to ambush unsuspecting prey and thrive in its dark, decayed surroundings.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other dark or plant creatures, especially those that thrive in decay.
environment: Usually found in dark, decayed areas rich with vegetation.
strengths: Resistant to cold and necrotic damage, and immune to being blinded or deafened.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, taking double damage from such attacks.
attacks: Uses Frozen Shadow Tendril to deal cold and necrotic damage, capable of inflicting significant harm.
most_powerful_ability: Animate Plants, which allows it to turn nearby vegetation into allies that can potentially become new Shadow Blights.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without needing sight.
skills: Proficient in stealth, providing a +4 bonus to avoid detection.
additional_information: Can blend in perfectly with its surroundings when motionless, difficult to detect.
It can produce additional threats by animating nearby plants.
Low intelligence and charisma indicate it's not very intelligent or socially engaging.
Can multiply its numbers in battle if not eliminated quickly.
Effectively utilizes darkness to its advantage for ambush tactics.
spellcasting: Can use Animate Plants to create animated allies.
test_queries: small plant monster that thrives in darkness
ambushing dark plant creature with necrotic attacks
creature that animates plants in decay
shadowy plant that blends into the environment
